nodes.text: The Massassi Isle was an island on the jungle moon Yavin 4. Several bunkers had been built here.
After the Rebel Alliance had evacuated the moon following the Battle of Yavin, a battle between Alliance and Imperial special forces took place on this island.

The Massassi Isle is a location in Sony Online Entertainment's MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. It is one of four Battlefields — player versus player combat zones where Imperial and Rebel players fight for the control of the island. The PVP battle zone was added with Game Update 10 in 2009. It is only accessible by participating in the Massassi Isle battlefield instance.
